lead_paragraph: Tim Welsh inherits a team that can be expected to contend for the Colonial Athletic Association title next season.
snippet: Tim Welsh inherits a team that can be expected to contend for the Colonial Athletic Association title next season.

headline.main: Welsh, a Coach Who Has Won, Gets a Chance to Contend at Hofstra
